content: 4 purl round 2 knit row 5 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to the last stitch k1 31 sts rem both sizes stitch count now refers to both row 6 purl sizes switch to dpn when the sts become tight row 7 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to the last on the circular needles stitch k1 26 sts rem round 3 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to the end row 8 p1 *p2tog p3 repeat from * to the of the round 35 sts rem end of the row 21 sts rem round 4 knit row 9 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to the last stitch k1 16 sts rem round 5 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to the end of the round 30 sts rem row 10 p1 *p2tog p1 repeat from * to the end of the row 11 sts rem round 6 knit row 11 *k2tog repeat from * to the last stitch round 7 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to the end k1 6 sts rem of the round 25 sts rem 2 | basic bulky hat ©2014 2019 shaina bilow designs www shainabilow com round 8 *k3 k2tog repeat from * to the end abbreviations of the round 20 sts rem dpn double pointed needles round 9 *k2 k2tog repeat from * to the end k knit of the round 15 sts rem k2tog knit two stitches together one round 10 *k1 k2tog repeat from * to the end stitch decreased of the round 10 sts rem m1 lift the horizontal running thread between the needles onto the left-hand round 11 *k2tog repeat from * to the end of needle from back to front knit this strand the round 5 sts rem through the front to twist closed one stitch increased finishing p purl p2tog - purl two stitches together one cut yarn leaving an 8 tail thread the stitch decreased yarn onto a tapestry needle and pull it rem remain/remaining though the remaining 5 sts to secure repeat repeat weave in tails attach a pom pom or tassel rs right side outside of the fabric as desired block st/sts - stitch/stitches st-st stockinette stitch rs row are knit and ws row are purl when worked flat when worked in the round all rounds are knit ws wrong side inside of the fabric i hope you enjoyed this pattern thank you for knitting one of my designs please post photos of your finished hats to ravelry instagram and facebook and tag me - @shaina bilow on instagram and @shaina bilow designs on facebook i look forward to seeing how your hats turn out shaina bilow 3 | basic bulky hat ©2014 2019 shaina bilow designs www shainabilow com
